name: Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Doujou Yaburi
name_original: Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Doujou Yaburi
description:
Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Doujou Yaburi is an arcade-digital board game developed by Chat Noir. It came out on 29-05-1997. It was published by Naxat Soft.
Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Doujou Yaburi is available on SEGA Saturn and PlayStation.
